medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient was in usual state of good health until two days prior to presentation, when he developed severe right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain that spread throughout the abdomen. The pain has been rated as severe, sharp, and associated with nausea. A similar episode occurred a year ago which self-resolved.
medical_history.family_history: Had mother, sister, uncle, and first cousin all with GB removed.
